categories.name: NFT
categories.prompt: Write a social media post announcing that I just minted a custom NFT. Mention that its DNA was generated from my Farcaster profile and include a call to action for others to join the 'Warplet' family.

categories.name: Web3 Update
categories.prompt: Write a bulleted update about Farcaster's new Solana integration. Include details on wallet and mini app support, instant bridging for Solana tokens, and a recommendation to fund SOL for increased airdrop chances.

categories.name: Platform Update
categories.prompt: Write an announcement about changes to a platform's creator reward program that mentions the discontinuation of the current version, its past payouts, and the strategic reason for the change.

categories.name: Seasonal Greeting
categories.prompt: Write a brief post for a holiday greeting from [Your Company/Project Name].

categories.name: Founder Profile
categories.prompt: Write a concise founder spotlight post introducing a web3 entrepreneur. Include their name, their company, their journey from a crypto experiment to building a significant project, and what they built for the community.

categories.name: Inspiration
categories.prompt: Write a short, optimistic social media post about new beginnings, opportunities, and the importance of seizing them.

categories.name: Community
categories.prompt: Write a short social media post about a specific holiday greeting that mentions a blockchain project as the sender.

categories.name: Product Update
categories.prompt: Write a social media post about a product update, indicating ongoing development and future features, and conclude with a call for user feedback on top requests.

posts.text:
Update: Farcaster Rewards are changing

Tomorrow will be the last day for current version of creator rewards. This experiment started a year ago and has paid out $1M+ to creators who casted on Farcaster. 

While this had some success, it's not aligned with our new direction. We will be launching a new experiment soon to replace the current program.

A big thank you to everyone who has participated in the creator rewards program for the last year!
